summary: Frontend testing completed for accordion functionality on visitor page. All 4 accordions (Ma Progression Ninja, Entrainement, Les Valeurs de l'Aikido, Histoire de l'Aikido) are working correctly with proper toggle behavior, chevron rotation, and content visibility.
critical_code_review_comments: SimpleAccordion component is well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for testing
Accordion state management using useState is appropriate for this use case
CSS transitions for chevron rotation and content visibility are smooth
context_for_next_testing_agent: Accordion functionality on visitor page is fully working. All 4 accordions have data-testid attributes: accordion-progression-header/content, accordion-entrainement-header/content, accordion-valeurs-header/content, accordion-histoire-header/content. Buttons inside accordions (PDF, CSV, Timeline, Journal) work correctly - they show appropriate messages for non-authenticated users.

buttons_tested.name: PDF
buttons_tested.behavior: Shows toast 'Inscrivez-vous pour télécharger votre progression en PDF' for non-authenticated users

buttons_tested.name: CSV
buttons_tested.behavior: Shows toast 'Inscrivez-vous pour télécharger votre progression en CSV' for non-authenticated users

buttons_tested.name: Timeline
buttons_tested.behavior: Opens 'Mon Parcours Aïkido' dialog with login prompt

buttons_tested.name: Journal
buttons_tested.behavior: Opens 'Mon Journal Privé' dialog with login prompt
